p: Rabies is a zoonotic disease caused by viruses belonging to the genus Lyssavirus; family Rhabdoviridae. It is now considered a re-emerging disease in different countries of the world and is associated with increased rates of reservoir contact [ 1].The disease is transmitted by the bite of a rabid animal; usually dogs; although bats act as a reservoir for lyssaviruses in many regions of the world [ 2].
